abstract: The pension plan of the American Federation of State, County and Municipal Employees has ginned up a colorful poster, complete with red umbrella, for its campaign against several Citigroup directors.
lead_paragraph: The pension plan of the American Federation of State, County and Municipal Employees has ginned up a colorful poster, complete with red umbrella, for its campaign against several Citigroup directors.

headline.main: Union Pension Plan Takes Aim at Citi Directors
